column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thin pizza tasted reheated from the freezer section at the grocery store. Deep dish came cold and the sauce tasted canned and bland--watery. Yes
column2: I tried both butter crust and regular crust--one was bland
column3: one just tasted like butter. What's up with no veggie options other than a spinach mix (mix? No fresh options)????  Salad came with a ton of chopped
column4: old looking tomatoes on them--I had to pick through the heap that was thrown on it.
